title: SORCERA, The Generals Part 1
description: Meet the infamous Sorceress General, Cera.On Genesis:"We were secret lovers who lived two very different lives.I was a general who revered the law, and he was a mercenary who constantly defied it.He had a community to feed while I had a kingdom to protect.He had freedom while I had power.He was the spark to my flame, and I was his fire."- Cera
author: Juddy Anderson C. Punzalan
